text: "Babushka Boi" is a song by American rapper ASAP Rocky, released as a single through ASAP Rocky Recordings and RCA Records on August 28, 2019. The music video was released the same day. ==Background== ASAP Rocky began wearing a babushka to cover the resulting cut on his face after he fell off his scooter in September 2018. This inspired Frank Ocean, who posted a picture on his Instagram of himself in a babushka, with ASAP Rocky commenting "Babushka Boi" on the image and later adding the phrase to his own Instagram. ==Music video== The Nadia Lee Cohen-directed music video was also released on August 28. It was inspired by Dick Tracy and features ASAP Rocky, ASAP Ferg and Schoolboy Q among several prosthetic-enhanced gangsters on the run from police, who are portrayed as anthropomorphic pigs. It has been noted that it was filmed before ASAP Rocky's arrest and detainment in Sweden. title: Babushka Boi
